articles.title: Marshfield native Scott Gustafson swaps seats at Fenway Park for view as leader of ESPN’s baseball coverage
articles.description:
Gustafson, a lifelong Red Sox fan whose family shared season tickets with others from the South Shore town, fondly recalls exactly where he watched games from at Fenway in his youth.

The post Marshfield native Scott Gustafson swaps seats at Fenway Park for view as leader of ESPN’s baseball coverage appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marshfield native Scott Gustafson leads ESPN's baseball coverage, enhancing local sports media.
Gustafson recalls childhood Fenway experiences, deepening community ties for Red Sox fans.
His role may increase local engagement with baseball, benefiting Boston sports culture.

articles.title: ‘We should stop talking October’: Alex Cora doesn’t want Red Sox to start thinking about playoffs yet
articles.description:
"I think we have to wait."

The post ‘We should stop talking October’: Alex Cora doesn’t want Red Sox to start thinking about playoffs yet appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Alex Cora urges Red Sox to focus on current games, not playoffs.
Red Sox currently sit at 75 wins, needing consistent performance to stay competitive.
Cora's comments aim to keep team grounded for upcoming crucial matchups.
